thread.title: Jan Freimuth

author: Jan Freimuth
title: Jan Freimuth
text: I am honestly thrilled at the kind, helpful, dependable people who have taken care of our pets when we lived in Texas and now our house, since we moved to Panama. They have all been people I hope to keep as friends. And although no money changes hands, the sitters we have chosen through TrustedHousesitters are invested in doing a good job and we have often come back to a home which is tidier than when we left.
